name: free messenger
short_description: VIPole is a secure messenger with a full set of useful features and tools for collaboration and data storage for business people and others who are really concerned about data security on the internet. VIPole guards user privacy and uses strong end-to-end encryption to protect personal and business communications (including group chats, audio and video calls), as well as all types of files and data. It’s a cross platform application and supports versions for Windows, Mac OS, Linux and Android. One account can be used across several devices simultaneously thanks to automatic data synchronization. VIPole for iOs is coming soon. Currently we have more than 400 000 active users of our services all over the world, 27% of which use our business solutions. Apps for PC platforms are available here https://www.vipole.com/en/download.
